job title: ផ្នែកសេវាកម្មអតិថិជន  Customer Service Representative
position: ផ្នែកសេវាកម្មអតិថិជន  Customer Service Representative
Job Description:
- គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធទទួលទូរស័ព្ទពីភ្ញៀវដែលមានចំនួនអតិថិជនដែលបានទំនាក់ទំនងមក និងមតិរបស់គាត់
- កំណត់ និងវាយតម្លៃតម្រូវការរបស់អតិថិជនដើម្បីទទួលបានការពេញចិត្តពីភ្ញៀវ
- ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងពេញលេញដោយប្រើវិធីផ្សេងៗ ឬឧបករណ៍តាមដែលត្រូវការ
- រក្សាទុកនូវរបាយការណ៍ពេលជួបភ្ញៀវ រៀបចំកំណត់ត្រាពេលទទួលភ្ញៀវ និងរក្សាទុកឯកសារផ្សេងៗ
- ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅដល់ភ្ញៀវដែលទាក់ទងពីគម្រោង ឬសេវាកម្ម
- ជូនដំណឹងដល់អតិថិជនអំពីការបញ្ចុះតម្លៃផ្សេងៗ ឬប្រូម៉ូសិនដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនមាន
- មានជំនាញខាងឆ្លើយតបជាមួយអតិទិជនតាមគេហទំព័រក្រុមហ៊ុន ប្រមូលលេខទូរស័ព្ទភ្ញៀវ និងជួយផ្នែកលក់

- Manage a system for large amounts of incoming calls and recording feedbacks
- Identify and assess customers’ needs to achieve satisfaction
- Provide accurate, valid and complete information by using the right methods/tools necessary
- Keep records of customer interactions, process customer accounts, and file documents
- Advice on company’s information regarding to products and terms of sales
- Inform customer of deals and promotions
- Reply to comments on our social media page, collect phone numbers of our valued customers, and able to help with sales
Job Requirement:
- មិនចាំបាច់ ប៉ុន្តែអាចជាការប្រសើរបើសិនបេក្ខជនមានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មជូនអតិថិជន
- ជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងតាមទូរស័ព្ទខ្លាំង និងពូកែស្តាប់ជាសកម្ម
- សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការសម្របខ្លួនតាមកាល:ទេស: ឬឆ្លើយតបទៅតាមអាកប្បកិរិយាផ្សេងៗរបស់ភ្ញៀវ
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការផ្តល់អាទិភាពដល់កិច្ចការចាំបាច់ និងគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព

តម្រូវការ ៖
- សញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ
- ជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័ររឹងមាំ និងកំរិតភាសាអង់គ្លេសមូលដ្ធាន
- ប័ណ្ណបើកបររថយន្ត

- Recommended, but not a requirement, one-year worth of customer support experience
- Strong phone contact handling skills and active listening skills
- The ability to adapt/respond to different types of customer behaviors
- Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively and efficiently

* Requirements:
- High school diploma or equivalent
- Strong computer skills
- Basic English knowledge
- Driver license

- ការគិតរហ័សដើម្បីផ្តល់នូវដំណោះស្រាយច្នៃប្រឌិតដែលឆ្លើយតបនឹងតម្រូវការ និងកង្វល់របស់អតិថិជន

Job Description:
- Lead on company technology change the program 
- Lead on technical project management design, development & rollout of technological solutions that supports company working model
- Ensure appropriate IT infrastructure is acquired and deployed to provide IT services, reflecting the challenges within the different locations by leading and delivering digital transformation projects, tools and solutions
- Develop automation solutions for manual systems to improve efficiency and ability to operate in geographical scattered operational and management teams
- Develop strategies to encourage users to use new technologies for the streamlines, shared and efficient way of working
- Accountable for the successful delivery of all technology work streams and ensuring they are understood at an operational level within the company, whilst maintaining day to day performance
- Control technology project schedules to ensure that improvement plans are completed on time and on-budget, according to the project plan
- Take ownership of the IT polices and ensure they are developed, maintained and implemented to ensure organizational compliance
- Manage the IT Help Desk to improve internal and external stakeholders experience of current systems and identify opportunities for improvement
- Maintain an up-to-date working knowledge on relevant technology developments and providing strategic direction, recommendations and guidance
- Ensure the cost-effective purchasing of IT hardware, software and support services
- Manage supplier contracts by ensuring robust service level agreements are in place and managed effectively to provide the best value for investment for A Klasse Auto
- Identify funding opportunities for technology development and support in the development of funding applications
- Manage, performance review and support the training of team members 
- Perform other ad hoc tasks as required by Management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in information technology, computer science, software engineering, or a related field
- Proven experience leading digital transformation projects
- Proven experience managing IT infrastructure and services
- Experience with computer networks, network administration, and network installation
- Proficient in computer hardware, cabling installation and support, wireless technology applications and interface, and IT security
- Skills in web & programming (HTML, CSS, Java, PHP, etc.)
- Proficient in Microsoft Windows software, including Server, Office, and Exchange
- Management and leadership skills
- Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks
- Highly organized and detail oriented
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
- Flexible working hours

job title: បុគ្គលិក ផ្នែកចង្ក្រានបាយ (Cook Helper / Steward) (បន្ទាន់​)
position: បុគ្គលិក ផ្នែកចង្ក្រានបាយ (Cook Helper / Steward) (បន្ទាន់​)
Company Profile:
Sushi Tei is one of the largest Japanese restaurant chains in Singapore and Asia, serving up authentic Japanese cuisine to food aficionados. Founded in 1994 with a Japanese as one of the founding members, Sushi Tei aims to offer the most authentic and satisfying experience in Japanese cuisine. Its unique blend of fresh and original dishes combines the best of Japanese authenticity, and as such has become a popular taste across the Asian Pacific region with more than 51 outlets serving up quality Japanese cuisine to customers every day.
   With an unwavering commitment towards quality, Sushi Tei has grown from its humble beginnings in Holland Village in Singapore to an impressive chain of outlets all over the country, and across Australia, China, Indonesia, Malaysia, and Brunai Darussalam, with over 2,000 employees. Sushi Tei is now expanding in Cambodia and this is indisputably the right time to carve your career with us.  We top the people’s choice in Japanese restaurants regularly and we contend for more awards actively.  At all times, we are endeavoring to achieve more success in future, looking at expanding our chain all over the world and gaining global recognition.
   With our rapid growth and expansion, we are seeking dynamic, vibrant, highly enthusiastic & motivated individual to be part of our team. We are welcome those who have a desire and passion for Food & Beverage industry to join us for the following position.

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

- Make sure control on the inventory to avoid any fault (Spare part Stock, Fuel Hydraulic, oil).
- Key in all the shift report for transfer area and land field.
- Follow up with truck shift and fuel consumption.
- Responsible for purchasing all materials and spare parts for repair work in the garage.
- Responsible for preparing all purchase request, materials and spare parts related to repair work with more relevant parts (orders).
- Responsible for managing tires such as (broken tires, new wheels and other wheel changes ...).
- Assist the Manager in setting the date to change the engine oil.
- Responsible for arranging and receiving vehicle repair requests from the transportation department and assisting in the repair work as well as keeping the repair documents in order.
- Responsible for administrative tasks such as staff attendance list, overtime list, leave / regular shift and other administrative documents required by the company.
- Assist the Manager in inspecting various occupational risks and safety at the garage location.
- Assist the Manager of the department in managing the inventory of the garage section.
- Perform various tasks as determined by the section manager.
Job Requirement:
- At least a year-3rd of the university in Business and administration, Management, or a related area
- 2 or 3 years of experience in related work. 
- Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…). 
- Highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and within the deadline
- Good interpersonal communication and problem-solving skill
- Confident and self-motivated
- Able to write, read, and speak in English.
- Work independence and self-management. 
- Excellent teamwork and team-building skills
- Strong desire to learn and commit to his/her further development.
- Ability to work under pressure and be flexible

Benefits
• The salary is competitive according to the candidates’ performance.
• Fuel, phone card allowance.
• Lunch provided.
• Work injury insurance and health care NSSF.
• Yearly appraisal work performance.
• Senoirity bonus.
• Others.

Company Profile:
Sushi Tei is one of the largest Japanese restaurant chains in Singapore and Asia, serving up authentic Japanese cuisine to food aficionados. Founded in 1994 with a Japanese as one of the founding members, Sushi Tei aims to offer the most authentic and satisfying experience in Japanese cuisine. Its unique blend of fresh and original dishes combines the best of Japanese authenticity, and as such has become a popular taste across the Asian Pacific region with more than 51 outlets serving up quality Japanese cuisine to customers every day.
   With an unwavering commitment towards quality, Sushi Tei has grown from its humble beginnings in Holland Village in Singapore to an impressive chain of outlets all over the country, and across Australia, China, Indonesia, Malaysia, and Brunai Darussalam, with over 2,000 employees. Sushi Tei is now expanding in Cambodia and this is indisputably the right time to carve your career with us.  We top the people’s choice in Japanese restaurants regularly and we contend for more awards actively.  At all times, we are endeavoring to achieve more success in future, looking at expanding our chain all over the world and gaining global recognition.
   With our rapid growth and expansion, we are seeking dynamic, vibrant, highly enthusiastic & motivated individual to be part of our team. We are welcome those who have a desire and passion for Food & Beverage industry to join us for the following position.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description:
- Design, conduct and initiate relevant T & D programs for employees, existing and new, at all levels in the organization.
- Acts as the liaison and coordinator of program conducted by internal & external training partners.
- Design a personal development plan (PDP) which is an integral part of the annual performance appraisal process, prepared after discussions between the employee, line manager and an HR representative, usually the T&D officer.
- To record T&D requirements for employees within their area of responsibility,
- Review existing program and resources to check if they can facilitate the T&D requirements,
- Design new program and courses using relevant media and prepare an annual T&D schedule for the employee, after discussions with the concerned parties.
- Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Management or a related field.
- At least 2 years of experience in management and associate development preferred.
- Communication: Strong listening and interpersonal skills. Candidates must possess good verbal and written communication skills and be able to communicate cross-functionally. Candidates communicate expectations and instructions to associates to execute company programs.
- Analytical: have strong strategic skills, be able to forecast business needs, and develop comprehensive solutions to complex problems.
- Proven track record of identifying opportunities and solutions to increase sales and improve operational processes.
- Computer: be proficient in Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Outlook, and the Internet.
- Organization:  be able to organize multiple priorities to ensure that resources are properly allocated to meet objectives. They must have strong organizational and intuitive skills to make sound decisions without direct supervision.
- Education: The knowledge, skills, and abilities typically acquired through the completion of a G.E.D. or high school diploma.

Company Profile:

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

- បុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈរីករាយជាមួយបុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈនិងការរៀបចំរឹងមាំ។
- មានវិជ្ជាជីវៈនិងចរិតលក្ខណៈល្អិតល្អន់ដោយយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ខ្ពស់ចំពោះចំណុចលម្អិត។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការប្រើកម្មវិធី Microsoft Office ដូចជា៖ Word, Excel, PowerPoint ។

Job Description:
Manage and supervise staff within in the Procurement function through planning, delegating, training and development, and assigning and reviewing their work.
Assist with the implementation of goals, objectives and methods for management of purchasing activities with the management.
Interpret, administer, and explain laws, regulations and guidelines governing procurement activities.
Assess and minimize risks in solicitation and contracts. - -- Compile, organize, and review solicitations and determine final award.
- Write specifications for the creation of public solicitations for goods and services required by the business.
- Communicate with other functions’ personnel to process purchase orders.
- Review contracts to ensure compliance with the terms and conditions of the company.
- Negotiate with vendors’ legal counsellor to resolve contract issues and legalities.
- Maintain bid information and process procurement transactions
- Analyze departmental budgets and provides guidance on appropriate budget transfers.
- Maintain contract records and files, and report and present findings to management.
- Assist internal auditing, state auditing, state compliance and state inspection officials as necessary.
- Perform other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
- At least3 years of experience in procurement, communication, or a related area.
- Knowledge of company’s rules, regulations and procedure
- Knowledge of procurement laws, regulations, and guidelines
- Familiarity with the business chart of accounts
- Knowledge of Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) and contract law
- Intermediate to advanced level in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, and Power Point)
- Strong organizational skills
- Strong interpersonal and communication skills
- Strong detail-oriented skills
- Strong analytical and logical thinking skills
- Ability to think creatively and innovatively
- Ability to work under pressure
- Ability to analyze and negotiate contracts.

More Information
Recruiter: Bora Chea, Tel: 095 888 639/098 706 762
Website: http://fairplusw.sgedu.site/fairplus/
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Job Description: •	Assist team leader for maintenance activities•	Follow the maintenance instruction and schedule from team leader•	Ensure all maintenance equipment and tools are properly cleaned and kept in the right place•	Properly use safety equipment and tools during doing maintenance job•	Properly implement technical standard and safety.•	Report to team leader for any equipment and tools lost/needed•	Repair all technical equipment in substation•	Assist to do substation checklists and report (if applicable)•	Assist team leader for inventory stock control of maintenance tools/equipment and report	30%•	Assist in the maintenance request and report preparation.	20%•	Check the functionality of control and protection relay as well as system, and inspect the main equipment as per schedule.•	Analyze technical problem.	40%•	Perform other related duties as required.	10%
Job Requirement: •	At least high diploma in Electrical Engineering or equivalence•	At least 1 year experiences in electrical high voltage, especially substation maintenance.•	Can speak reading, and write English•	MS Word, Excel, Internet and email.•	Able to use AutoCAD program and other technical application.•	Understand substation control and protection system. •	Familiar with electrical drawing.•	Understand the functionality and operation of substation main equipment.•	Ability to analyze technical issue and troubleshoot problem.•	Dynamic, flexibility, and resourcefulness.•	Able to work independent as well as team work.•	Challenge and willing to learn.•	Good communication both in Khmer and English•	Self-confidence and able to work under pressure.
Company Profile:
SOMA Group Co., Ltd. founded in 2007, is one of Cambodia’s leading local conglomerates and a Management & Consulting firm. Today, the Group comprises of 10 subsidiaries operating in 5 industries. 
Based in Phnom Penh, SOMA Group companies now employs more than 2,500 staff countrywide. 
Soma Group Co., Ltd. values excellence and integrity in our companies and we promote a culture of shared values focused on the principle that we are here to serve real needs and solve real problems in Cambodia's promising industries.

job title: HR/Admin Officer មន្រ្តីធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាល
position: HR/Admin Officer មន្រ្តីធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាល
Job Description:
** កាតព្វកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- ពិនិត្យរាល់លិខិតចេញ-ចូល ក្នុងការិយាល័យកណ្តាល ដោយ ធ្វើការចុះលេខ ឬបោះត្រាចូល និងបញ្ជូនលិខិតទាំងនោះទៅផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
- ទុកដាក់នូវរាល់គោលការណ៍ នីតិវិធី សេចក្តីសម្រេច និងសេចក្តីណែនាំនានា ឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមលក្ខណៈបច្ចេកទេស។
- គ្រប់គ្រង ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដានឯកសារបុគ្គលិក (Staff’s Profile) ដែលខ្វះចន្លោះដើម្បីបំពេញបន្ថែមឱ្យបានគ្រប់គ្រាន់។
- ស្កេនរាល់ឯកសារសំខាន់ៗ និងទុកដាក់ឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
- ចាត់ចែង រៀបចំបន្ទប់សម្រាប់ ការប្រជុំ ឬការហ្វឹកហ្វឺនបុគ្គលិក និងអាហារសម្រន់ តាមតម្រូវការ​ជាក់ស្តែង។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងទិញសម្ភារៈការិយាល័យ សម្រាប់ផ្គត់ផ្គង់ការ ប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងការិយាល័យកណ្តាល។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំខែរបស់បុគ្គលិក។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ការងារថែមម៉ោងរបស់បុគ្គលិក។
- គ្រប់គ្រង តាមដានការងារសន្តិសុខសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ ការិយាល័យ កណ្តាល
ការយាមប្រចាំការរបស់មន្ត្រីសន្តិសុខ ដោយរក្សាឱ្យបាននូវសុវត្ថិភាពក្នុងកន្លែងការងារ។
- ថែទាំ ទុកដាក់ឧបករណ៍-សម្ភារៈ និងសារពើភ័ណ្ឌទំាងអស់របស់ ហ្វូតាបា​ ឱ្យមានរបៀបរៀបរយ។
- ទំនាក់ទំនង សម្របសម្រួល និងរៀបចំឯកសារដែលតម្រូវដោយក្រសួងពាក់ព័ន្ធនានារួមមាន ក្រសួងការងារជាដើម។ល។
- ធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗ គាំទ្រផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល ក្នុងគ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា តាមតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។

** គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិកពេញសិទ្ធិនូវ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖
១. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងទៅតាមបទពិសោធន៍។
២. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ ១០០% ​នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៣. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ១០០% នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៤. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសារ (ប្តី/ប្រពន្ធ និងកូន២នាក់)។
៥. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ជីវិត ២៤ ម៉ោង។
៦. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំណងដៃ អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក។
៧. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងអត្រាការបា្រក់ទាបបំផុត។
៨. ការឈប់សម្រាកអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់ក្រសួងការងារ និងការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
៩. ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារ។
១០. ផ្តល់ទូរស័ព្ទ និងស៊ីមកាត។
១១. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសំាង $៥០ក្នុង១ខែ។
១២. ប្រាក់ឈ្នួលម៉ូតូ $៨០ ក្នុង១ខែ​ សម្រាប់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
១៣. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ទៅមន្ត្រីដែលសម្រេចបានគ្រប់ផែនការ (Incentive)។
១៤​. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ​ តាមគោលការណ៍កំណត់របស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង, រដ្ឋបាលសាធារណៈ,ធនាគារ​ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ, ច្បាប់,...។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ លើផ្នែកជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងហោច រយៈពេល១ឆ្នាំ។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អប្រសើរ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម។
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស​ អាចសរសេរ និងនិយាយបានល្អ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms Office Word-Excel ។

** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ៖ បេក្ខជន / បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍បំពេញការងារជាមួយ គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី សូមផ្ញើពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ (CV និង Cover Letter) ជាមួយរូបថត (4x6) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីមុខតំណែង និងទីតាំងដែលចង់បម្រើការងារឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងយកមកដាក់នៅតាមការិយាល័យសាខារបស់ ហ្វូតាបា ឬអាចផ្ញើមកតាមរយៈ
- Email: hr@futabamfi.com.kh (នាយកដ្ឋានធនធានមនុស្ស)។
- សូមបញ្ជាក់ឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់អំពីប្រាក់បៀវត្សរំពឹងទុក។
- ឈប់ទទួលពាក្យត្រឹម៖ ថ្ងៃទី៣១ ខែមករា ឆ្នាំ២០២១ ម៉ោង ០៥:០០ ល្ងាច​ (អ្នកដាក់ពាក្យមុនត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត)
** សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម៖
សូមទំនាក់ទំនងផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស ទូរស័ព្ទលេខៈ 070 319 333 ឬចូលទៅកាន់គេហទំព័រៈ www.futabamfi.com.kh ឬ Facebook: Futaba Microfinance Plc.

job title: Senior Credit Officer មន្រ្តីឥណទានជាន់ខ្ពស់
position: Senior Credit Officer មន្រ្តីឥណទានជាន់ខ្ពស់
Job Description:
** រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ និងខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ

** កាតព្វកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ទៅដល់អតិថិជនសក្តានុពល។
- ធ្វើការសិក្សា វិភាគ វាយតម្លៃលទ្ធភាពសង និងទ្រព្យដាក់ធានារបស់អតិថិជនឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងសំណើសុំឥណទាន ដើម្បីដាក់ជូន នាយកសាខាឬគណៈកម្មាធិការឥណទានពិនិត្យ និងអនុម័ត
- ថែរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយអតិថិជនដែលមានស្រាប់ និងស្វែងរក អតិថិជនថ្មីបន្ថែម។
- បញ្ចេញឥណទានទៅតាមផែនការ ដែលបានកំណត់ដោយ នាយកសាខា។
- ពង្រឹងគុណភាពនៃការប្រមូល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាយឺតយ៉ាវ ក្នុងការសងត្រឡប់ឥណទានមកវិញឲ្យបានទាន់ពេល។
- បង្កើនទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរក្នុងតំបន់ ដែល ហ្វូតាបា កំពុងធ្វើប្រតិបត្តិការ និងសិក្សាអំពីគូប្រកួតប្រជែងក្នុងតំបន់ ព្រមទាំងរៀបចំផែនការ ដើម្បីទទួលបានចំណែកទីផ្សារបន្ថែម។ 
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ ជូន អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។

** គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិកពេញសិទ្ធិនូវ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖
១. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងទៅតាមបទពិសោធន៍។
២. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ ១០០% ​នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៣. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ១០០% នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៤. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសារ (ប្តី/ប្រពន្ធ និងកូន២នាក់)។
៥. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ជីវិត ២៤ ម៉ោង។
៦. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំណងដៃ អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក។
៧. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងអត្រាការបា្រក់ទាបបំផុត។
៨. ការឈប់សម្រាកអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់ក្រសួងការងារ និងការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
៩. ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារ។
១០. ផ្តល់ទូរស័ព្ទ និងស៊ីមកាត។
១១. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសំាង $៥០ក្នុង១ខែ។
១២. ប្រាក់ឈ្នួលម៉ូតូ $៨០ ក្នុង១ខែ​ សម្រាប់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
១៣. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ទៅមន្ត្រីដែលសម្រេចបានគ្រប់ផែនការ (Incentive)។
១៤​. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ​ តាមគោលការណ៍កំណត់របស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិសិ្សតកំពុងសិក្សា ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រង គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូន អតិថិជន មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម។
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស​ អាចសរសេរ និងនិយាយបានល្អ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms Office Word & Ms Excel។
- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូ។
- ផ្តល់អទិភាពដល់អ្នកដែលធ្លាប់បម្រើការងារ នៅភ្នំពេញ និងនៅខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ។

** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ៖ បេក្ខជន / បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍បំពេញការងារជាមួយ គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី សូមផ្ញើពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ (CV និង Cover Letter) ជាមួយរូបថត (4x6) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីមុខតំណែង និងទីតាំងដែលចង់បម្រើការងារឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងយកមកដាក់នៅតាមការិយាល័យសាខារបស់ ហ្វូតាបា ឬអាចផ្ញើមកតាមរយៈ
- Email: hr@futabamfi.com.kh (នាយកដ្ឋានធនធានមនុស្ស)។
- សូមបញ្ជាក់ឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់អំពីប្រាក់បៀវត្សរំពឹងទុក។
- ឈប់ទទួលពាក្យត្រឹម៖ ថ្ងៃទី៣១ ខែមករា ឆ្នាំ២០២១ ម៉ោង ០៥:០០ ល្ងាច​ (អ្នកដាក់ពាក្យមុនត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត)
** សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម៖
សូមទំនាក់ទំនងផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស ទូរស័ព្ទលេខៈ 070 319 333 ឬចូលទៅកាន់គេហទំព័រៈ www.futabamfi.com.kh ឬ Facebook: Futaba Microfinance Plc.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department  070 479 333 recruitment@futabamfi.com.kh #៧៩៥ មហាវិថីព្រះមុនីវង្ស សង្កាត់បឹងត្របែក (មានទីតាំងស្ថិតនៅទុលមុនសាលា បឹងត្របែក) ខណ្ឌចំការមន ភ្នំពេញ។ 070 479 333

Job Description:
- Greet customers, answer phone, and guide all
hotline calls for their inquiries by maintaining confidentiality.
- Record all inquiries and complaint from customers to complaint handling forms for further actions.
- Provide timely, professional, and appropriate feedback to customer regarding to their complaints and concerns within the time limits.
- Addressing and advising customer on Futaba’s products and services information
- Report daily and Monthly report to supervisor.
- Do some other tasks assigned by supervisor within the scope of work of FUTABA.

** FUTABA Microfinance Plc. provides Salary and others benefits as bellow:
1. Basic salary with high competitive
2. Khmer New Year Bonus 100% of Basic Salary
3. Pchum Ben Ceremony Bonus 100% of Basic Salary
4. Health insurance covered staff and their families (Spouse & 2 Kids)
5. 24 hours insurance covered staff safety
6. Staff wedding package
7. Staff Loan
8. Staff Uniform
9. Fuel allowance of $50 per month.
10. Other Benefits
Job Requirement:
- At least 4 th year of Bachelor in Marketing or related field.
- Experiences in related field with the banking or MFI sector is much appreciated
- Good communication & interpersonal skills
- Good command of spoken and written English
- Good at Microsoft office.
- Be able to work under pressure, overtime and
honesty.

** How to Apply: Candidates who are interested to work with FUTABA Microfinance Plc, please submit your CV, cover letter, 4x6 of photo, family book copy, and other identification apply via FUTABA’ Office or by mail to:
hr@futabamfi.com.kh (Human Resource and Admin Department).
- Please indicate your expected salary.
- Closing Date: January 31 st , 2021 at 5:00 pm (First candidate is encouraged).
** For more information:
Please contact to HR department via: 070 318 999 or visit our website: www.futabamfi.com.kh or Facebook: Futaba Microfinance Plc.
** (Candidates who has applied for a job can’t withdraw applications)
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department  070 479 333 recruitment@futabamfi.com.kh #៧៩៥ មហាវិថីព្រះមុនីវង្ស សង្កាត់បឹងត្របែក (មានទីតាំងស្ថិតនៅទុលមុនសាលា បឹងត្របែក) ខណ្ឌចំការមន ភ្នំពេញ។ 070 479 333

Job Description:
- រៀបចំតុបតែង កែលម្អ និងសំអាតទីកន្លែងបម្រើការងារ ចំណតយានយន្ត បន្ទប់ទឹក/បង្គន់ បរិវេណក្នុង-ក្រៅការិយាល័យ និងឧបករណ៍-សម្ភារៈឱ្យបានស្អាត មានរបៀបរៀបរយ និងសោភ័ណភាពល្អ។
- រៀបចំឱ្យមានគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ព្រមទាំងពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំនូវធុងសម្រាមតាមតុធ្វើការ
និងសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹក / បង្គន់ ធានាមិនឱ្យមានក្លិនអាក្រក់កើតឡើង។
- ប្រមូលសម្រាមពីក្នុងការិយាល័យ និងបរិវេណគ្រឹះស្ថាន ទៅដាក់នៅទីកន្លែងរថយន្តសម្អាតទីក្រុង ឬកន្លែងចាក់សម្រាមដទៃទៀត នៅជិតការិយាល័យឱ្យបានទាន់ពេល។
- ធ្វើការតាមដាន និងរាយការណ៍ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង រាល់ការមិនចូលរួមថែរក្សានូវសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យរបស់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងបរិវេណ / ការិយាល័យ របស់ ហ្វូតាបា។
- រៀបចំបម្រើភេសជ្ជៈ សម្រាប់ភ្ញៀវ-បុគ្គលិកឱ្យបានគ្រប់គ្រាន់ មានអនាម័យ និងរៀបចំដាក់ឱ្យនៅដាច់ពីគ្នា រាល់កែវទឹក ពែង និងឧបករណ៍ផ្សេងៗទៀតឱ្យមានភាពស្អាតល្អ ប្រកបដោយ អនាម័យជានិច្ច។
- បោក សំអាត កម្រាលតុ កន្សែងជូតដៃ និងឧបករណ៍ វាយនភ័ណ្ឌផ្សេងៗទៀតឱ្យបានស្អាតជាប្រចាំ
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំង ឬតាមតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ក្នុងសមត្ថកិច្ចតួនាទី។

** គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិកពេញសិទ្ធិនូវ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖
១. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងទៅតាមបទពិសោធន៍។
២.​ ​ប្រាក់បៀវត្សទី១៣ និង១៤ (ចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ ១ខែ និងភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ១​ ខែ)។
៣. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសា (ប្តី/ប្រពន្ធ និងកូន២នាក់)។
៤. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ជីវិត ២៤ ម៉ោង។
៥. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំណងដៃ អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក។
៦. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងអត្រាការបា្រក់ទាបបំផុត។
៧. ការឈប់សម្រាកអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់ក្រសួងការងារ និងការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
៨. ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារ។
Job Requirement:
- មានកម្រិតសិក្សា​ ត្រឹមថ្នាក់អនុវិទ្យាល័យ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ជំនាញ។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ លើផ្នែកជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងហោច រយៈពេល១ឆ្នាំ។
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម អត់ធ្មត់ ស្រលាញ់ការងារ និងគោរពពេលវេលា។

Job Description:
** Work environment:
At Hops, you work with an international and highly professional team. A junior accountant will assist you in your tasks, as well as a dedicated cost controller.

General working times are 48 hours per week. We are able to offer flexibility in your personal work schedule.

** Main duties and Responsibilities:
- Manage all accounting operations based on accounting principles / QB system
- Prepare monthly financial statement, balance sheets and fix assets report etc.
- Prepare monthly tax declaration and yearly tax declaration and e-tax filing
- Prepare a daily revenue report to the shareholders
- Prepare monthly accounting reports and sent to shareholders
- Develop periodic reports for management
- Audit financial transactions and documents for accounting control procedures
- Support HR and manage staff contracts and salary payments
- Stay updated on financial policies, regulations and legislations

** Other:
- Support the cost controller in analysing expenses and cost
- Monitor POS system and provide reports to the General Manager
- Keep information confidential and secure them with random database backups
Job Requirement:
- BA in Accounting & experience with tax declaration
- Diploma in Cambodian tax a plus
- Minimum of 4-year work experience
- Experience with hospitality business is a plus
- High degree of accuracy and time management skills
- Deadline and result oriented

** Please send your CV to or contact us for more information:
info@hops-brewery.com 093 999 000
Company Profile:
Hops Craft Beer Garden & Restaurant is a German brewery and beer garden located in the very center of one of Asia’s most attractive and vibrant cities: Phnom Penh, Cambodia. The main venue features a craft beer brewery with a beer garden & outdoor grill, a restaurant, an art lounge, private rooms, terraces and a sports bar with high-end billiard tables and electronic darts. Our main location features a full international cuisine with a comprehensive menu.

Unique in Cambodia - our brewery ingredients are 100% natural, imported from Germany and our beer is produced following highest German brewing standards. Our food is generally modern German, occasionally fused with Asian and international cuisines. We use natural local and imported ingredients of highest quality and pride ourselves on top level food preparation with fresh produce only.

We are adding satellite locations around town ranging from a kiosk with craft beer and German snacks, to smaller craft beer restaurants with full German menus of up to 20 items.
The main venue holds up to 200 diners at a time, with 150 servings being a standard evening. Other venues will be able to serve up to 30 diners at a time.

We have developed a standard food offering which is highly appreciated by our international clientele, which is comprised of 50% Cambodian, 25% Asian and 25% international customers. Our food is a mix between German classic and modern specialties, and international options including vegetarian and vegan options.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  093 999 017 info@hops-brewery.com No. 17 Street 228 Phnom Penh-Cambodia 093 999 017

job title: HR Executive (Talent Acquisition and Training & Development)
position: HR Executive (Talent Acquisition and Training & Development)
Job Description:
1) Prepare budget planning for HR Recruitment.
2) Job Announcement, Recruiting, interviewing & selection as per requested by respective function to provide competent and qualified candidate for all vacancies punctually when required.
3) Process employment contract, personnel file and HR requisition.
4) Manage staff profile both hard and soft document includes employment contract, personnel file, and HR requisition to ensure that those documents are find and entries properly and privately.
5) Support all company subsidiaries in staff recruitment and selection across all levels from the sourcing & selection of candidates.
6) Prepare all necessary facilities need for new employee including: stationary, desk, computer, internet connection, and email & login user, business card.
7) Prepare slide presentation in order to conduct orientation for new employee.
8) Develop and update job description to ensure work balance within each department in cooperation with department manager.
9) Manage buddy system to support and provide necessary helps to new employee while s/he is on job boarding.
10) Maintain organization staff by establishing a recruiting, and interviewing program; conducting and analyzing exit interviews; recommending changes.
11) To do other tasks assigned by Talent Acquisition and Training & Development Manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration or related disciplines.
- Minimum 3-year experience in Recruitment and Training and Development field.
- Good communication in English and Khmer.
- Good inter-personal skills.
- Be flexible and able to adapt with fast growing environment.

Job Description:
Description:
We are looking for a Digital Account Executive to join our editorial team and enrich our digital marketing team with new blog posts, guides and marketing copy.

Digital Account Executive responsibilities include conducting thorough research on industry-related topics, generating ideas for new content types and proofreading articles before publication. If you’re familiar with producing online content and have an eye for detail, we’d like to meet you. Feel free to share samples of your work or portfolio of your published articles, along with your application. Ultimately, you’ll deliver quality writing pieces that appeal to our audiences, attract customers and boost brand awareness.
Job Requirement:
Requirement:

•Submit work to manager for input and approval
•Coordinate with marketing and design teams to illustrate articles
•Conduct simple keyword research and use SEO guidelines to increase web traffic
•Promote content on social media and monitoring
•Identify customers’ needs and gaps in our content and recommend new topics
•Ensure all-around consistency (style, fonts, images and tone)
•Update website content as needed
•Understand client expectation and interpret to team
•Create and keep up-to-date trending content on social media
•Conduct creative contents
•Write article or press release 
•Work between internal team and client
•Other task assign by manager

Job Description:
o Detailed Requirements (clauses) of international
standards are understood, so that there is clarity about
“what success looks like.” Whenever possible, work
done to satisfy one standard is used to satisfy others.
o Training is provided to AFC associates to help them
comply with standards.
o Document Management System is maintained
o Internal Audits and Gap Analyses are performed to
identify non-conformances. Policies, procedures, and
actual practices are studied and analyzed. Findings and
recommendations are presented to a wider group for
root cause analysis and problem solving.
o Corrective Action Requests are resolved. CARs are
viewed as projects, with next steps and timelines, and
appropriate follow-up is conducted until the item is
cleared.
o Management Review Meetings highlight new legal and
customer requirements, progress, challenges, trends,
and resource requirements.
o Coordinate external audit and consultant
o Establish policy, procedure, and form etc.
o Feedback and Communication Systems facilitate group
Job Requirement:
o Minimum 2-3 years of job-related experience
o Bachelor’s Degree in Food Science or Food Technology
o Strong in English
o Computer skills required: MS office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), MS Visio
o Knowledge in GMP, HACCP, BRC and SA8000 are preferred

Job Description:
•	Assist the Operations Director in day-to-day marketing-related tasks at store level.
•	Researching and brainstorming each stage of the project.
•	Delegating assignments to members of the Graphics department, as needed.
•	Coordinating efforts to ensure that campaigns are completed.
•	Adhering to time and financial restrictions.
•	Tracking changes in consumer engagement following the roll-out of each marketing campaign.
•	Compiling reports detailing the effects exerted by each campaign, and sharing these with Operations Director.
•	Coordinate with Brand Managers on all brands-related marketing activities including social media management, creative development, contest management, event management, etc.
•	Participate in weekly internal marketing meetings with the Operations Director.
•	Constant email communications with relevant departments.
•	Assist in bi-monthly marketing planning with Marketing Managers and respective Brand Managers.
•	Assist the Marketing Manager on all production-related matters including briefing of suppliers, delivery of POS materials to stores, etc.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Marketing, Business Admin, or similar field.
•	At least two years of work experience in Marketing field, and/or experience in Retail/F&B is an advantage.
•	Good command of written and spoken English.
•	Basic understanding of marketing and brand management.
•	Eager to learn new things, flexible and possess a can-do attitude.
•	Able to accept challenges and work under pressure.
•	Good interpersonal skills, friendly, confident and communicative.

Benefits:

- Generous Wages
- Employee Discounts
- Paid Annual Leave
- Holiday Pay
Company Profile: The SOHO Diversified Group of Companies ("SOHO") is a group of Cambodia-based private limited liability companies with investments in the retail, food, distribution and services industries. Through its fully-owned enterprises and joint ventures, SOHO Diversified Group is one of the fastest growing operators of concept retail stores in the kingdom of Cambodia. The group develops partnerships through franchises, joint ventures and exclusive distribution agreements with brands worldwide.

Job Description: •	Supervise the design team to fully understand the concept of shop drawings and tendering drawings•	Evaluating design development activities and ensuring accuracy of work prior to final production.•	Develop MEP drawing and detailed design specifications to ensure that all the MEP confirmed drawings are accompanied with detailed list of MEP material specifications, for instance, functional design, sizes and shapes. •	Meets work standards by following production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving operational problems; identifying work process improvements•	Collaborate with the warehouse for periodical review and update of the material order plan to ensure effective purchase order of MEP material on time. •	Manage on Site MEP Technician to ensure that they responsible for building know the MEP drawing that assigned to them with absolute clarity. •	Ensure strict and correct translation of MEP drawings into construction on site •	Work in close collaboration with MEP foremen to ensure the correct installation of re-bars and form work in strict compliance with the MEP Material installation methods.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor Degree Electrical Engineering or related field •	Advanced knowledge of design software in relation to the MEP design including AutoCAD or Revit and MS office software such as Excel, Word, Power Point, MS Project & Access•	5+ Years of Experience in a designer and drafting role •	Must have knowledge/experience with ACMV systems•	Good understanding of MEP Building construction •	Experience with air-conditioning design •	Must be able to work under pressure. •	Have good negotiation skills, Communication skills, interpersonal skills; and problem solving skills, a minimum basic understanding of English

position: មន្ដ្រី ឥណទាន
Job Description:
គ្រឺះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ប្រាយម៍ អិមអេហ្វ អិលធីឌី Prime MF Microfinance Institution Ltd បាននិងកំពុងផ្ដល់ឱកាស ការងារដល់សិស្សនិស្សិតដែលកំពុងសិក្សា និងបានបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សារ ដើម្បីទទួលបាននូវបទពិសោធន៍ ក៏ដូចជាឱកាសការងារក្នុង គ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ប្រាយម៍ អិមអេហ្វ អិលធីឌី ក្នុងនោះដែរ គ្រឺះស្ថានបាននិងកំពុងបើកឱកាសការងារសំរាប់ផ្នែកមន្ដ្រីឥណទាន3០នាក់។

**តួនាទីនិងភារៈកិច្ចៈ
-ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល សេវាកម្មដើម្បី ជ្រើសរើសអតិថិជន ដែលមានលក្ខខណ្ឌស្របតាមតម្រូវការ 
-រៀបចំឯកសារឥណទាន ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីជូនអតិថិជន និងបណ្តុះវិន័យឥណទានដល់អតិថិជន
-តាមដានការប្រើប្រាស់ឥណទានការប្រែប្រួលនៃស្ថានភាពជីវភាពរបស់អតិថិជន
-ធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
-ទាក់ទាញអតិថិជននិងពង្រីកតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ 
-ធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋានអោយបានល្អ
-បញ្ចេញឥណទានជូនអតិថិជនឲ្យស្របតាមបចេ្ចកទេស
-ប្រមូលប្រាក់សំណងត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមដានការសងត្រឡប់មកវិញ
-ចូលរួមធ្វើការដោះស្រាយការយឺតយ៉ាវរបស់អតិថិជន 
- ចូលរួមបង្កើតយុត្តិសាស្រ្ដក្នុងការបញ្ចេញប្រាក់កម្ចី
Job Requirement: **លក្ខខណ្ឌការងារៈ- កំពុងសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រឬទើបបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សា- មានឬគ្មានបទបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ- បេក្ខជនត្រូវមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ស្មោះត្រង់និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ- មានសុខភាពល្អនិងមានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសារអង់គ្លេសនិងកំព្យូទ័រ- ត្រូវមានអាយុចាប់ពី២០ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបានមានៈ១-ប្រាក់ខែប្រកួតប្រជែង និងលក្ខខណ្ឌការងារល្អជាមួយគោលនយោបាយធនធានមនុស្ស ដែលស្របតាមច្បាប់ការងារកម្ពុជា២- ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស៣- ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត៤- ការលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ (CO) យោងទៅតាមការអនុវត្ត៥- ប្រាក់កម្ចីបុគ្គលិក៦- ធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព៧- ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន ២៤ ម៉ោង៨- ឱកាសជាច្រើនសម្រាប់ការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ (ភាគច្រើនយើងលើកកម្ពស់បុគ្គលិកផ្ទៃក្នុង)៩- ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ១៥ ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ១០- ផ្តល់សិក្ខាសាលា និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញ១០- ចូលរួមសិក្ខាសាលា១១- ផ្តល់ប្រាក់ជួលម៉ូតូ និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសាំង១២- ឯកសណ្ឋានប្រចាំឆ្នាំ១៣- ផ្តល់ជូនប្រាក់ចងដៃអាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក១៤- ផ្តល់ជូនប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភសម្រាប់ការផ្តល់កំណើតកូនរបស់បុគ្គលិក*** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យសុំៈដើម្បីដាក់ពាក្យសុំសូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover Letter) មកកាន់អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@primemf.com / admin@primemf.com ឬមកកាន់ការិយាល័យកណ្តាលផ្ទះលេខ ៤៩៤ សេផ្លូវ ២៧១ ភូមិសន្សំកុសល ៥ សង្កាត់បឹងទំពុន ១ ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ ភ្នំពេញប្រទេសកម្ពុជា។** មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលត្រូវបានជ្រើសរើសប៉ុណ្ណោះដែលត្រូវបានជូនដំណឹង។ * អ្នកទំនាក់ទំនង៖ ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាល * ទូរស័ព្ទ៖ ០១០ ៥០០ ២៧៧ / ០១៧ ៨១៦ ៨១០ / ០២៣ ៩៩៣ ៩០៥ * អ៊ីមែល៖ hr@primemf.com
Company Profile: Prime MF Microfinance Institution Ltd. is a licensed microfinance institution with a mission to provide financial services to individuals and groups in Cambodian communities to help them liberate from unprivileged status.  The MFI was registered with the Ministry of Commerce in August 2010 as a financial service provider and obtained a microfinance institution license from the National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) in December 2010. To ensure access to financial services for communities in broader areas, Prime MF has opened its new branch every year since 2013 and recently opened 7th branch in Kampong Speu Province in December 2019. Prime MF is a well-known provider of microfinance service in Phnom Penh with its flexible and speedy process. With a strong operation team and management, Prime MF is one of the fastest growing micro financial institute in Phnom Penh. It has fulfilled its commitment by increasing loan portfolio with affordable products and quality financial performance.
Contact Info: Contact Information Prime MF Microfinance Ltd  010500277 hr@primemf.com #494C, St.271, Phum SansomKosal 5, Sangkat Beung Tumpun, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010500277

Company Profile:
OUR HISTORY
PTC Computer Co. Ltd was established in Phnom Penh since 1996. We started with a small business, but as a result of our dedication, loyalty, reliability, affordable prices, excellent customer services, excellent range of products and technical expertise, we have grown remarkably successful that we are now well recognized as one of the biggest IT store in Cambodia. Our reputation, in the last two decades, has gone far and beyond which has led us to expand as the largest IT company to supply genuine products and warranty services to customers. PTC Computer is privileged and honored to be partners with well-known international IT brands as authorized distributor and service provider in Cambodia. As a result, we are the Authorized Distributor of over fifteen brands.

Job Description:
- Purchase goods, materials, components or services in line with specified cost, quality and delivery targets
- Support the purchasing and inventory function and other relevant departments and communicate any supply problems which may impact on business operations
- Act as an interface between suppliers and other relevant departments on purchasing processes and new projects and activities
- Monitor and advise on any issues which present risk or opportunity to the company
- Monitor market trends, competitor strategies and market suppliers
- Provide analysis on costs, new and existing and review cost reduction activities
- Prepare reports and updates as and when required
-Work closely with others in the procurement function and review opportunities for continuous improvement and business improvements
- Assist in negotiating contracts, improve prices and terms of business with suppliers and review opportunities to make business savings utilizing negotiation and procurement best practice tools and methods
- Prepare and raise purchase orders and order schedules
- Build, maintain and manage supplier relationships and keep up good communications
- Ensure that a professional and consistent approach is taken in relation to all supplier relationships
- Ensure compliance to company guidelines, purchasing policies and procedures and during supplier negotiations and contracts award process
- Conduct research for new components and suppliers
- Compile data relating to supplier performance to enable evaluation
- Assess and evaluate suppliers and contribute to performance reviews to ensure contract compliance
- Perform other ad hoc tasks as required by Management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's Degree in Business or Accounting required (MBA preferred)
- Computer literate, with advanced Excel skills/abilities
- Relevant experience preferred
- Previous experience of working in a purchasing team preferably within an automotive or manufacturing environment
- Experience of working closely with suppliers
- Good knowledge of purchasing, negotiation, commercial understanding and cost breakdown
- An understanding of automotive processes and components would be advantageous
- Excellent computer skills (Excel, Microsoft Word, PowerPoint)
- Critical thinking and negotiation skills
-Able to build and maintain effective and productive relationships with staff, stakeholders and suppliers
- Good communication, negotiation, interpersonal and influencing skills
- Analytical, numerically astute with strong demonstrated problem-solving abilities
- Able to manage time effectively, priorities tasks and achieve set targets
- Commercial and financial awareness with a full understanding of how failure impacts the company and customer order fulfilment
- Able to work well under pressure and handle emergency and stressful situations
- Keen attention to detail and accuracy

Job Description:
- Setup and analyse internal operations to identify areas of process enhancement
- Develop actionable business strategies and plans that ensure alignment with short-term and long-term objectives developed in tandem with the CEO or Board of Directors
- Directly oversee operations and work with the CEO to achieve growth targets over the near term
- Aggressively manage capital investment and expenses to ensure the company achieves company targets relative to growth and profitability
- Monitor performance with tracking and establish corrective measures as needed, and prepare detailed reports, both current and forecasting
- Maintain and build trusted relationships with key customers, clients, partners, and stakeholders
- Empower the operational team with the leadership and resources they need to successfully complete operations initiative
- Work with the human resources department to develop and implement staffing programs to attract the best applicants and improve employee retention
- Oversee Technical Support Team or Special Force Team to achieve their goals 
- Work closely with senior management team to create, implement and roll out plans for operational processes, internal infrastructures, reporting systems and company policies all designed to foster growth, profitably and efficiencies within the company.
- Forge strategic partnerships and relationships with clients, vendors, banks, investors and all other professional business relationships.
- Foster a growth oriented, positive and encouraging environment while keeping employees and management accountable to company policies, procedures and guidelines.
- Oversee all branch operations and work directly with Branch Managers to ensure business operations are smooth, standardized and profitable.
- Oversee development of new internal branch or franchise expansions
- Ensure the development of new products or services to keep up with market advancement and implement at all branch outlets
- Keep updated on market and competitor research
- Defines an Operations strategy that is in line with the vision and the business strategy of the Country. 
- Ensures that the Operations strategy is broken down into Regional goals and Site level goals
- Builds the yearly budget and financial plans for the Operations Department.
- Ensures that customer satisfaction- is assessed with necessary improvement actions taken.
- Ensures the monitoring of the sites’ quality performance using internal audits. Ensures the implementation of the related action plans.
- Ensures that business continuity risks are identified and business continuity plans are implemented on sites. 
In case business continuity is disrupted, approves actions according to validation rules.
- Ensures that the Operations department collaborates effectively with other departments.
- Ensures that there are valid procedures in place in Operations and that Operations team members adhere them. Ensure that group Operations standards are continuously adapted. 
- Reports to CEO & Group management using standardized reporting. Performs other duties assigned by the CEO
- Continuously manages Operations performance: sets financial, customer satisfaction and operational performance goals for the Regions and Sites. Leads at least monthly reviews to monitor actual progress / performance of the set goals.
- Ensures that actions are defined on these reviews so performance stays on target.
- Ensures integration & development of Regional Managers by internal / external trainings & by personal coaching and mentoring.
- Recommends to the CEO / decides about the recruiting / progression / removal of Operations team members.
- Ensures that performance assessments are completed in the Operations Department.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
• To manage all operational transportation activities of HB owned transportation vehicles as well as the coordination of third party transport service provider.
• To implement all required safety standards of HB related to transportation, loading/unloading and general traffic safety. 
• To ensure proper daily truck arrangement are made for delivery based on the company’s daily distribution and/or sales plan.
• To follow up closely on the truck arrangement and take necessary actions to prevent from late delivery. 
• To work closely and effectively with third party transport service provider to ensure the availability of their trucks to fulfill the company’s sale plan.
• To check daily performance and take actions to improve
• To ensure the attendance and scheduling of drivers and workers are checked on a daily basis.
• To ensure the drivers conduct daily inspection on trucks based on checklist
• To coordinate with Warehouse to plan the loading on time.
• To educate and check if the loading of finished goods are handled carefully during loading into the trucks.
• To go field visit to check the delivery
• To do briefing to all transportation team on safety, best practice and transportation standards.
• To guide and motivate transportation team to improve product handling to avoid damages
• To prepare/check payment of drivers, workers, and third party transport service provider.
• To ensure all transport payments are posted on time and correctly in SAP.
• To actively be involved in the maintenance of all trucks and equipment.
• To initiate, execute or participate in suitable action where necessary to improve logistics operations.
• To assist in making, reviewing, and updating all transportation reports, processes, and work instructions.
• To assist in training, coaching, and developing team members to meet the requirements of the company’s work standards
• To do other related tasks required by superior.
• To strive for customer satisfaction on delivery service, OTIF 100%.
• To work effectively and efficiently to comply of the quality management system ISO 9001 and food safety management system ISO 22000 requirement.
Job Requirement:
• Education: Can read/write both Khmer and English.
• Experiences: at least five years experiences in delivery operation.
• Skills: good communication, 5S and Health & Safety. Valid driving license and be a leader role model.

Job Description:
• To arrange trucks for delivery based on the company’s daily sale plan.
• To follow up closely on the truck arrangement and take necessary actions to prevent from late delivery. 
• To work effectively with the contracted transport vendors to ensure the availability of their trucks to fulfill the company’s sale plan.
• To visually inspect all loading trucks and take necessary actions to prevent from unsafe loading regarding product quality and transportation.   
• To actively be involved in the maintenance of all trucks and equipment.
• To initiate, execute or participate in suitable action where necessary to improve warehouse/logistic operations.
• To assist in making, reviewing, and updating all transport reports, processes, and work instructions.
• To always work in a safe manner, following the safety rules and instructions and common sense.
• To take actions to prevent others from working in an unsafe manner.
• To do other related tasks required by superior.
• To strive for customer satisfaction on delivery service, OTIF 100%.
• To work effectively and efficiently to comply of the quality management system ISO 9001 and food safety management system ISO 22000 requirement.
Job Requirement: • Education: Can read/write both Khmer and English.• Experiences: at least two years experience in delivery operation.• Skills: good communication, 5S, and Health & Safety. Valid driving license and be a leader role model. Basic Computer (Ms.Word, Ms.Excel)

Job Description:
1. Assist Finance Director to develop strategic plan, strategic direction, and capital budgeting
2. Prepare master budget, project cost budget, annual budget and rolling forecast.
3. Prepare financial modelling to be able to accurately forecast the cash flows and funding needs and support business decisions and investments.
4. Prepare monthly management reporting.
5. Identify, review, and monitor key business drivers of revenue, expenses across departments and projects.
6. Perform insightful analysis of actual results, variances, KPIs, risks and opportunities.
7. Review the MIS data, input, report, and processes to ensure accuracy and appropriate control of the data integrity.
8. Document and review existing workflow and control process for improved efficiency and effective control.
9. Stay up to date on market trend, market research and key economic indicators impacting the business performance.
10. Other assignments and ad-hoc projects as assigned by line manager
Job Requirement:
Education/Experience
- Possess bachelor’s degree in accounting, ACCA or related field.
- Minimum 5-year solid experiences in preparing managing budgeting, forecasting and data analytics
- Professional English speaking and writing skill, able to communicate effectively.
- Knowledge of Business Intelligence, and data-modelling is an advantage
- Good computer skill including Microsoft Excel, Power Queries and Power Pivot
- Professional English speaking and writing skill, able to communicate effectively
- Knowledge of SAP Business One is an advantage.

Knowledge / Skills / Abilities

- Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in team
- Ability to communicate effectively with all stakeholders and senior management.
- Accountable, solutions and initiative driven, proactive and self-disciplined.

Job Description:
Regional management:
- Ensure proper and sufficient network coverage of market by sales force.
- Ensure region workforce is at full strength at all times and is optimum.
- Ensure region is compliance with company’s policies and procedures.
- Ensure sufficient stock and products availability for Sales team.
- Ensure sales target achievement for region and Sales team.
- Ensure proper documentations and safe keeping of all records.
- Ensure market dynamic and changes are overcome and reported to management.
- Ensure competitor activities is reported on timely basis.

People management:
- Ensure quality recruitment of company employee.
- Ensure quality retainment of company employee.
- Ensure company employee are properly train and retrain over time.
- Ensure company employee are compliance to company policies and procedures.
- Ensure company employee feedback are recorded and reported to management.

Workforce enhancement
- Provide on job training for Area Supervisors in using company’s sales tools.
- Provide on job training for Area Supervisors in their selling skills and network expansion skills.
- Provide on job training for Operations Supervisors in using company’s reporting tools.
- Perform scouting of potential candidates and talent within their designated area for potential recruitment.

Market intelligence
- Compile and provide proper reporting of competitor’s activities with action plans to management.
- Compile and provide proper reporting on market demand for any demand of new potential products with action plans to management.
- Compile and provide proper reporting on market changes and behavior changes of key retailers and customers and feedback to management.

Stocks, cash and data handling
- Ensure Sales team perform daily reconciliation with Operations team to ensure no products or cash is lost.
- Ensure Sales team and Operations team perform checking on any cash received to ensure no damage or counterfeit notes.
- Ensure Sales team and Operations team key in data timely and accurately.
Sales reporting
- Prepare Sales team performance and incentive for direct line manager and brief the Area Supervisors on a monthly basis.
- Prepare routing report on the effectiveness and efficiency on all Sales team under their region on a monthly basis.
Job Requirement:
I. Attitude, Knowledge and Skills, Experience and Attitude
** The minimum education, knowledge, skills & desired attitude required to perform this position
- Honest, hardworking and willing to learn traits.
- Supportive, positive thinking and teamwork traits.
- Able to travel and mobile nationwide.
- Minimum tertiary education in business administration or management.
- Minimum able to speak Khmer and English language fluently, other language proficiency will be an advantage.
- Minimum able to write Khmer and English language proficiently, other language writing will be an advantage.
- Extensive knowledge of local area and familiar with the area.
- Extensive knowledge of market needs and demand.
- Minimum 5 years of experience in sales functions and sales skills.
- Minimum 2 years of experience in supervisory or management functions and management skills.
- Proficiently in using computers and Microsoft application skills.
- Good interpersonal, communication and guidance skills.

II. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
** (How is the position’s performance measured?)
- Regional overall performance
- Regional sales target
- Regional network coverage
- Regional workforce headcount
- Regional integrity of stocks, cash, data and workforce

Job Description:
Department management:
- Plan and execute department business plans which are aligned with company’s objectives.
- Plan and execute department initiatives and ensure the success of each initiative.
- Plan and ensure department business plans and initiatives are aligned with other departments.
- Manage and ensure department is compliance with company’s policies and procedures.
- Manage and ensure department is operating with effectiveness and efficiency.

People management:
- Manage and ensure quality recruitment of department’s employee.
- Manage and ensure quality retainment of department’s employee.
- Manage and ensure department’s employee are properly train and retrain over time.
- Manage and ensure department’s employee are compliance to company policies and procedures.
- Manage and ensure department’s employee feedback are recorded and reported to management team.

Workforce enhancement
- Identify and propose training to enhance knowledge and skills based on department’s needs.
- Identify and propose career advancement plan for department’s talented employee.
- Identify and propose inter departmental movement for department’s talented employee.
- Plan and execute department’s succession plans.
- Plan and execute short term assignment to enhance department’s employee skills.

Market intelligence
- Propose action plans for competitor’s activities in the market.
- Propose action plans to ensure market demand is meet.
- Propose action plans to ensure market changes is handled.
Department reporting
- Prepare department performance report for top management on a monthly basis.
- Prepare department business plans, initiative progress report for top management on a monthly basis.
- Manage and ensure department’s report is accurate and on time submission.
Job Requirement:
I. Attitude, Knowledge and Skills, Experience and Attitude
** The minimum education, knowledge, skills & desired attitude required to perform this position
- Honest, hardworking and willing to learn traits.
- Supportive, positive thinking and teamwork traits.
- Able to travel and mobile nationwide.
- Minimum tertiary education in business administration or management.
- Minimum able to speak Khmer and English language fluently, other language proficiency will be an advantage.
- Minimum able to write Khmer and English language proficiently, other language writing will be an advantage.
- Extensive knowledge of local area and familiar with the area.
- Extensive knowledge of market needs and demand.
- Minimum 8 years of experience in sales functions and sales skills.
- Minimum 5 years of experience in management functions and management skills.
- Proficiently in using computers and Microsoft application skills.
- Good interpersonal, communication and guidance skills.

II. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
** (How is the position’s performance measured?)
- Department overall performance
- Department sales target
- Department workforce headcount
- Department integrity
- Inter department support

Job Description:
•	Perform visitation to the company’s key retailers and customers following the assigned routing on a monthly basis.
•	Provide and share product knowledge with the key retailers and customers during visits.
•	Provide and share promotions and event with the key retailers and customers during visits.
•	Provide and merchandise the products to ensure good visibility for the products in key retailer’s outlets.
•	Provide and display point of sales material for the key retailers and customers during visits. 
•	Plan and enhance Sales Representative routing to ensure effectiveness and efficiency of their route.
•	Tag with Sales Representative to monitor and review the effectiveness and efficiency of the route. 
•	Provide feedback to direct line manager on the capacity of the current Sales Representative under their supervision.
•	Provide on job training for Sales Representative in using company’s sales tools.
•	Provide on job training for Sales Representative in their selling skills and network expansion skills.
•	Perform scouting of potential candidates and talent within their designated area for potential recruitment.
•	Observe and gather information on any competitor’s activities from their team and feedback to direct line manager.
•	Observe and gather information on market demand for any demand of new potential products from their team and feedback to direct line manager.
•	Observe and gather information on market changes and behavior changes of key retailers and customers and feedback to direct line manager. 
•	Perform daily reconciliation and ensure Sales Representative perform daily reconciliation with Operations team to ensure no products or cash is lost.
•	Perform checking and ensure Sales Representative perform checking on any cash received to ensure no damage or counterfeit notes.
•	Perform sales key in data and ensure Sales Representative key in data timely and accurately.
•	Prepare sales team performance and incentive for direct line manager and brief the Sales Representative on a monthly basis.
•	Prepare routing report on the effectiveness and efficiency on all Sales Representative under their supervision on a monthly basis.
•	Prepare sales team and market feedback report for their direct line manager on a monthly basis.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement

•	Honest, hardworking and willing to learn traits.
•	Supportive, positive thinking and teamwork traits.
•	Able to travel and mobile within designated area.
•	Minimum secondary education background.
•	Minimum able to speak Khmer and English language, other language proficiency will be an advantage.
•	Knowledge of local area and familiar with the area.
•	Knowledge of market needs and demand.
•	Minimum 2 years of experience in sales functions and sales skills.
•	Minimum able to use computers and Microsoft application skills.
•	Good interpersonal, communication and guidance skills.

Working Hour/day:

•	Working days		: Monday ~ Saturday (Half)
•	Working Hours 	: 8:00am ~ 5:00pm, (1 hour break, 12:00pm -1:00pm) 
•	Holidays		: Saturday (Half), Sunday and Public Holiday

Others Benefit:

•	Competitive Salary
•	Sale Incentive
•	Business Trip
•	Annual Leave
•	Sick Leave
•	Special Leave
•	Public Holiday
•	Yearly Salary increment
•	Insurance: NSSF
•	Seniority etc.

Job Description:

- Handle and prepare stock issuing to Sales and Retail team daily.
- Handle and prepare stock clearance from Sales and Retail team daily.
- Handle stock receiving from headquarters.
- Handle stock count daily and safekeeping in safe room.
- Handle stock transfer back to headquarters.
Operations cash handling:
- Handle cash receiving from Sales and Retail team daily.
- Handle cash count daily and safekeeping in safe room.
- Handle cash bank in daily.

Operations reporting:
- Prepare sales and stock form for Sales and Retail team daily.
- Prepare bank in slip report daily.
- Prepare inventory report daily.
- Prepare and file in all documents daily.
- Prepare and submit all documents to headquarters monthly.
Outlet sales and services:
- Handle customers that patronize the outlet for product purchase.
- Handle customers that patronize the outlet for product servicing.
- Handle customers complain and report back to direct superior.

Outlet conditions and hygiene:
- Maintain and check outlet conditions daily.
- Maintain and clean outlet daily.
- Maintain and check company assets daily.

- Good interpersonal and communication skills.
- Administrative experience is an added advantage.

II. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

- Stock and cash handling
- Accuracy and timely in reporting
- Compliance of company policies and procedures
- Cleanliness of outlet
- Punctuality at work

Job Description:
- រៀបចំបង្កើតបណ្តាញទីផ្សារ ការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និង រៀបផែនការបរិមាណលក់
- ធ្វើផែនការ និងអនុវត្តន៏យុទ្ធសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ និងលក់អោយមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាព ដើម្បីធានាពង្រឹងការលក់ ប្រចាំខែនិងប្រចាំឆ្នាំទៅតាមផែនការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនកំណត់
- ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ ដើម្បីលើកជាគំរោងផែនការលក់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំផ្តល់នូវការគាំទ្រដើម្បីអោយ ផែនការលក់នោះទទួលបានជោគជ័យ ។
- ដឹកនាំនិងបង្ហាត់បង្ហាញភា្នក់ងារលក់អោយមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព 
- រក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងអោយមានភាពជិតស្និតជាមួយអតិថិជនចាស់ និងស្វែងរកអតិថិជនថ្មី ៗ
- ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាទូទៅ ដែលនឹងជួបប្រទះអោយល្អប្រសើរទាន់ពេលវេលា និងតាមគោលការក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
- ធ្វើវិភាគទៅលើលទ្ធផលនៃការលក់ និងដំណោះស្រាយផ្សេងៗដើម្បីរាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានក្រុមហ៊ុន
- ធ្វើការតាមដានស្ថានភាពទីផ្សារ និង គូប្រជែង ដើម្បីធានាការលក់ទៅតាមផែនការ ។
- ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងៗ ទៀតដែលចាំបាច់តាមតម្រូវការរបស់អគ្គនាយកក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងលក់ រឺសញ្ញាបត្រដែលទាក់ទងទីផ្សារ និងយ់ដឹងដឹងច្បាស់ពីចំពោះវិស័កសិកម្មនៅក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា ។
- មានភាពទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់និង មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ 
- ជាជនជាតិខ្មែរ មានអាយុចាប់ពី ៣០ ឆ្នាំឡើង
- រៀបចំផែនការលក់ និងទីផ្សារដល់បុគ្គលិក និងដាក់គោលដៅលក់ទៅទីផ្សារគោលដៅ
- អាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធ និងបន្ថែមមពេលវេលាដើម្បីផែនការពេញលេញ

Job Description:
Planning:
• Participate in opening meetings with internal audit manager/relevant parties in the company to explain the scope & objectives of the audit engagement to relevant parties an overview of all steps in the audit process
• Develop a thorough understanding of business processes in scope for assigned audits and document the processes in flowcharts and/or process narrative.
• Identify and document inherent risks and controls within business processes.

Fieldwork:
• Develop a risk-based test plan by selecting appropriate audit approach, test procedures and sampling criteria based on professional judgement and departmentally defined internal audit methodology
• Perform audit tests and prepare working papers in accordance with professional standard & IA methodology
• Evaluate the adequacy of process design and the effectiveness of controls in meeting business & control objectives.
• Identify and document control and process weaknesses and provide evidential support for findings.
• Propose practical and value-added recommendations to address control weaknesses or process ineffectiveness.
• Organize and reference work papers for review by manager
• Participate in closing meetings with manager and relevant parties in the company

Preparing Reports:
• Assist in preparation of a concise and informative audit report to effectively communicate the findings and recommendations to manager/management.
Follow up audit finding:
• Follow up the audit finding both internal & external from each department
• Make sure the findings are implemented on time

Other responsibilities:
• Contribute to the safeguarding of corporate assets and the interests of member by ensuring the appropriate internal controls are in place and operating effectively
• Conduct investigations of suspected internal fraud
• Develop and maintains effective and professional working relationship with all levels of staff within the company, including senior management and audit committee of board (if any)
Job Requirement:
• At least bachelor’s degree of Accounting, Finance, Business and other relevant degree
• At least 2 year experiences in auditing (distribution industry is preferable)
• Well-developed technical skills in Word, Excel & Power
• Experience in handling fraud case and investigation
• Able to communicate in English well
• Able to travel to provinces
• Knowledge of financial recording, laws, regulations and standards
• Able to prepare auditing workpaper documents
• Ability to work effectively with diverse populations
• Solid understanding of risk and control concepts. Ability to apply these concepts to evaluate the adequacy and effectiveness of business process
• Ability to communicate effectively, both orally and in writing
• Understand of IT control environment
• Displays awareness of the need for confidentially in sensitive matters
• Well-developed organizational skills with ability to prioritize multiple assignments
