Job Description:
** Key Responsibilities 
The role of Asset Management comes with significant responsibility, and this should be articulated in Asset Management job description by listing some of the following duties and tasks:
•	Manage and track whole asset of company  
•	Creates asset master data into system by ensuing assignment to the correct cost center, asset class, location, and depreciation method
•	Print coding sticker to each physical asset 
•	Record Asset movement such as Asset transfer, return, scrape and disposal 
•	Check and verify asset request and ensure an issuance asset to requestor following the requisition timely
•	Prepare daily/monthly report for asset management to manager when required
•	Work with department head to perform asset count or spot check to ensure asset are located the right place and department
•	Reconcile daily/monthly/yearly GL accounts relating to Asset posting 
•	Perform/posts monthly asset depreciation and simulate all amount and GL before posting to accounting
•	Maintain asset documentation and keep on the proper folder
•	Assist to provide timely any asset duty to manager such as paying property tax, licenses, and other annual payment under asset management
•	Regularly communicate to asset owners to ensure they use asset in a proper way and taking care of the asset
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s Degree in accounting or relevant field
•	At least 1 year of experience in accounting field or related field.
•	Knowledge of finance and accounting
•	Good in Microsoft Office, internet and email
•	Good at in English and Khmer

Job Description:
• Responsible for the quality and workmanship of every activity, thorough knowledge of all phases of engineering construction relating to Civil, MEP, Architectural, and Structural discipline interfacing the multidisciplinary operations.
• Taking care of QA/QC documents of the entire project including certificates, calibration, test results, inspection requests, non-compliance reports and site instruction/observations, permanent materials delivered, and other QA/QC documents.
• Develop and determine all standards to perform inspection and tests on all procedures and oversee all testing methods and maintain high standards of quality for all processes.
• Review quality of all materials at the site and ensure compliance with all project specifications and quality and collaborate with the department for all material procurement and maintain a quality of materials.
• Supervise the effective implementation of all test and inspection schedule and ensure adherence to all procedures and coordinate with various teams to perform quality audits on processes.
• Assist with employees to ensure knowledge of all quality standards and ensure compliance to all quality manuals and procedures and collaborate with contractors and suppliers to maintain the quality of all systems.
• Manage to lift of all types of equipment and handle the efficient storage of all hazardous materials and perform quality audits as per required schedule.
• Analyze all products and non-conformance processes and evaluate all documents to ensure the maintenance of optimal quality and prepare monthly reports to evaluate performance.
• Monitor an efficient system and record for all project activities and analyze all processes to ensure all work according to quality requirements.
• Manage all work methods and maintain knowledge on all quality assurance standards and monitor continuous application for all quality assurance processes and recommend corrective actions for all processes.
• Develop a method statement for the activity including risk assessment and job safety environmental analysis and Inspection Test Plan and Checklist based on specifications of the project.
• Liaise the Technical Engineer for submission of material submittals to Consultant
• Coordinate with the consultant's representative and Site In-charge for inspection.
• Report to the Construction Manager, control, and monitor all activities related to Quality.
Job Requirement:
• Degree qualified: Bachelor Degree in materials engineering or a related field.
• At least 3 years of relevant work experience in materials engineering. 
• Excellent analytical skills
• Experience with construction materials design
• Establish a system to ensure collaborative problem solving with the site delivery team, which will involve regular 
dialogue with contractors, team working, and risk-sharing.
• Effective in building good working relationships within complex structures both within projects, with clients, and internally.

Job Description:
• បង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន និងបណ្តាញដៃគូ
• ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហារបស់អតិថិជនដូចដែលអតិថិជនបានលើកឡើង

• ជំនាញវិភាគ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហារួមជាមួយនឹងសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការសម្រេចចិត្ត
Job Requirement:
• ត្រូវមានមធ្យោបាយផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន និងអាចធ្វើដំណើរចេញក្រៅបាន
• មានជំនាញ និងសមត្ថភាពអន្តរបុគ្គលល្អដើម្បីកសាងទំនាក់ទំនងរឹងមាំជាមួយអតិថិជន
• មានជំនាញផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនក្នុងការគណនាលេខល្អ និងអាចដោះស្រាយការទូទាត់រវាងអតិថិជន
• អាចប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងជាភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានខ្លះៗ
• ស្មោះត្រង់ និងរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់

+អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបានៈ 
• ប្រាក់ខែគោល
• ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត (Incentive)
• ប្រាក់ថែទាំម៉ូតូនិងថ្លៃសាំង
• ស៊ីមនិងទូរស័ព្ទសម្រាប់ការទំនាក់ទំនង

Job Description: The IT Support team maintains the computer networks of all types of organizations, providing technical support and ensuring the whole company runs smoothly. IT Support monitors and maintains the company computer systems, installs and configures hardware and software, and solves technical problems. Because of the nature of the job, some companies may require their IT Support to undertake shift work.• Installing and configuring computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers and scanners• Configure Email Client software MS. Outlook, Lotus Notes etc…• Monitoring and maintaining computer systems and networks VPN.• Talk staff or clients through a series of actions, either face-to-face or over the phone, to help set up systems or resolve issues, Providing technical support across the company• Responding in a timely manner to service issues and requests• Troubleshoot system and network problems, diagnosing and solving hardware or software faults• Setting up accounts for new users• Repairing and replacing equipment as necessary• Testing new technology• Possibly training more junior staff members
Job Requirement: • Understand Operating system Windows, MAC• Understand Server & Client software configuration for office software• Understand Basic Network configure CCNA1 & CCNA2 Training Certificate• Understand Basic Hardware Component Clone for Desktop, Server Hardware.
Company Profile:
OUR HISTORY
PTC Computer Co. Ltd was established in Phnom Penh since 1996. We started with a small business, but as a result of our dedication, loyalty, reliability, affordable prices, excellent customer services, excellent range of products and technical expertise, we have grown remarkably successful that we are now well recognized as one of the biggest IT store in Cambodia. Our reputation, in the last two decades, has gone far and beyond which has led us to expand as the largest IT company to supply genuine products and warranty services to customers. PTC Computer is privileged and honored to be partners with well-known international IT brands as authorized distributor and service provider in Cambodia. As a result, we are the Authorized Distributor of over fifteen brands.

Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY:

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer)
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer)
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (២០ នាក់)​ ​សាខាក្រុងបន្ទាយមានជ័យ ​សាខាក្រុងតបាត់ដំបង សាខាស្រុកមោងឬស្សី ​សាខាក្រុងពោធ៍សាត់ ​សាខាក្រុងកំពង់ឆ្នាំង សាខាស្រុកពញាព្ញ សាខាច្រាំងចំរេះ

** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឱ្យបានទូលំទូលាយនូវផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញដៃគូសក្តានុពលទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅ
- វាយតម្លៃដៃគូ និងទ្រព្យធានាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព
- សម្របសម្រួលដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរក្សាគុណភាពឥណទានក្រោយពេលផ្តល់កម្ចីដល់ដៃគូ 
- ការងារដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:
- ចម្រើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍សមរម្យ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ​ ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ ឱកាសដំឡើងតួនាទី ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភជួលម៉ូតូ ថ្លៃសាំង កាតទូរស័ព្ទ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ចំពោះសុខភាព ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់​២៤ម៉ោង និងប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​ 
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអំពីជំនាញ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
Job Requirement:
** គុណវុឌ្ឍិរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ត្រូវបានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ និងមានអទិភាពសម្រាប់និស្សិតថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគ្រប់ជំនាញ
- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ
- មានប្រវត្តិ​​ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការ​ធ្វើការ​ងារ​ជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រនៅតាមសហគមន៍
- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម​ ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ

** របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ:
បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិដូចខាងលើ សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបមកកាន់អ៊ីមែល: job@chamroeun.com

** បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ក៏អាចផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប មានបិទរូបថតថ្មី ដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងច្បាប់ថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ (បើមាន) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ប័ណ្ណបើកបរ​ រួចផ្ញើមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការចម្រើនដែលនៅជិតលោកអ្នក ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាលដែលមានអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្ទះលេខ៤២៥ ផ្លូវ២៧១ សង្កាត់ទួលទំពូង២ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា ឬទូរស័ព្ទៈ ០៧០ ៩៦០​ ៦៦៦

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer)
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer)
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (២០ នាក់): សាខាក្រុងភ្នំពេញ សាខាជ្រោយចង្វា សាខាស្រុកស្អាង សាខាក្រុងតាខ្មៅ សាខាស្រុកពាមរក៍ សាខាស្រុកគងពិសី និង​សាខាក្រុងកំពត

** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឱ្យបានទូលំទូលាយនូវផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញដៃគូសក្តានុពលទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅ
- វាយតម្លៃដៃគូ និងទ្រព្យធានាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព
- សម្របសម្រួលដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរក្សាគុណភាពឥណទានក្រោយពេលផ្តល់កម្ចីដល់ដៃគូ 
- ការងារដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:
- ចម្រើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍សមរម្យ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ ឱកាសដំឡើងតួនាទី ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភជួលម៉ូតូ ថ្លៃសាំង កាតទូរស័ព្ទ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ចំពោះសុខភាព ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់​២៤ម៉ោង និងប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​ 
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអំពីជំនាញ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
Job Requirement:
** គុណវុឌ្ឍិរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ត្រូវបានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ និងមានអទិភាពសម្រាប់និស្សិតថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគ្រប់ជំនាញ
- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ
- មានប្រវត្តិ​​ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការ​ធ្វើការ​ងារ​ជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រនៅតាមសហគមន៍
- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម​ ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ

** របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ:
បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិដូចខាងលើ សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបមកកាន់អ៊ីមែល: job@chamroeun.com

** បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ក៏អាចផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប មានបិទរូបថតថ្មី ដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងច្បាប់ថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ (បើមាន) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ប័ណ្ណបើកបរ​ រួចផ្ញើមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការចម្រើនដែលនៅជិតលោកអ្នក ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាលដែលមានអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្ទះលេខ៤២៥ ផ្លូវ២៧១ សង្កាត់ទួលទំពូង២ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា ឬទូរស័ព្ទៈ ០៧០ ៩៦០​ ៦៦៦
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer)
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer)
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (២០ នាក់)​ សាខាក្រុងសៀមរាប សាខាស្រុកសូទ្រនិគម សាខាស្រុកពួក ​សាខាក្រុងកំពង់ធំ សាខាស្រុកសន្ទុក ​សាខាក្រុងកំពង់ចាម សាខាស្រុកព្រែឈរ

** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឱ្យបានទូលំទូលាយនូវផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញដៃគូសក្តានុពលទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅ
- វាយតម្លៃដៃគូ និងទ្រព្យធានាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព
- សម្របសម្រួលដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរក្សាគុណភាពឥណទានក្រោយពេលផ្តល់កម្ចីដល់ដៃគូ 
- ការងារដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:
- ចម្រើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍សមរម្យ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ ឱកាសដំឡើងតួនាទី ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភជួលម៉ូតូ ថ្លៃសាំង កាតទូរស័ព្ទ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ចំពោះសុខភាព ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់​២៤ម៉ោង និងប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​ 
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអំពីជំនាញ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
Job Requirement:
** គុណវុឌ្ឍិរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ត្រូវបានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ និងមានអទិភាពសម្រាប់និស្សិតថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគ្រប់ជំនាញ
- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ
- មានប្រវត្តិ​​ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការ​ធ្វើការ​ងារ​ជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រនៅតាមសហគមន៍
- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម​ ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ

** របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ:
បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ និងមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិដូចខាងលើ សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបមកកាន់អ៊ីមែល: job@chamroeun.com

** បេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ក៏អាចផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប មានបិទរូបថតថ្មី ដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងច្បាប់ថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ (បើមាន) សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ប័ណ្ណបើកបរ​ រួចផ្ញើមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការចម្រើនដែលនៅជិតលោកអ្នក ឬការិយាល័យកណ្តាលដែលមានអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្ទះលេខ៤២៥ ផ្លូវ២៧១ សង្កាត់ទួលទំពូង២ ខណ្ឌចំការមន រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា ឬទូរស័ព្ទៈ ០៧០ ៩៦០​ ៦៦៦

Job Description:
• Set, together with the management, targets to be achieved in Cambodia
• Reporting directly to top management, you will have the overall responsibility and authority for the effective management and timely execution of the construction projects
• Be the main point of contact for various stakeholders in Cambodia, taking a leading role in preparing, proposing and detailing ground improvement solutions to clients in Cambodia
• To lead and manage a team of project engineers with responsibilities in the project management of infrastructure and facilities planning & development.
• Control and monitor work progress and ensure work quality
• Overall planning and controlling of the cost of project execution
• Overall co-ordination of the work progress of large and complex project
• Gather all necessary information related to the prospects
• Prepare proposals including constant contacts with the clients for optimization of the company’s offer
• Attend technical meetings and presentation sessions with clients
• Contribute to ensuring effective and efficient execution of contracts to achieve the targeted margins
• Achieve the objectives assigned by the management, Assessing and minimizing risk
• Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs
• Coordinating and supervising construction engineers
• Provide timely project progress reporting to management
Job Requirement:
• Hold Bachelor or Master degree in Mechanical Engineering / Electrical Engineering and other equivalent degree
• At least 10+ years of working experience in construction
• Knowledge and Experience with ACMV is a must
• Has construction manager background with good sale and management skill
• Previous experience on project manager is preferable
• Good up to date knowledge on foundation market in Cambodia
• Numerous contacts with clients & consultants, with excellent communication skills.
• Excellent verbal and written command of English
vWord, Excel, PowerPoint, Project
Company Profile:
The Singaporean-managed Company that started in 2008 and is currently principally engaged in Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing & Fire- Fighting (MEPF) Contracts in Cambodia.
We build our business strategies around the Singaporean spirit of Co- operation, Commitment to excellence as well as our belief to only provide the very best to our Clients.
We were officially incorporated back in 2015 under the Law of the Kingdom of Cambodia with the respective documentations to uphold the legitimacy and reliability of the Company.
As a Singaporean Company we uphold a high level of expectation of ourselves for the Services provided. We are associated with highly reputable companies in various parts of SEA and Europe to cater to the ever-changing global market. This has Enhanced the Company with strong technical support and financial capabilities as well as the expertise and know-how to deliver as promised.

Job Description:
• Supervise the design team to fully understand the concept of shop drawings and tendering drawings
• Evaluating design development activities and ensuring accuracy of work prior to final production.
• Develop MEP drawing and detailed design specifications to ensure that all the MEP confirmed drawings are accompanied with detailed list of MEP material specifications, for instance, functional design, sizes and shapes. 
• Meets work standards by following production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving operational problems; identifying work process improvements
• Collaborate with the warehouse for periodical review and update of the material order plan to ensure effective purchase order of MEP material on time. 
• Manage on Site MEP Technician to ensure that they responsible for building know the MEP drawing that assigned to them with absolute clarity. 
• Ensure strict and correct translation of MEP drawings into construction on site 
• Work in close collaboration with MEP foremen to ensure the correct installation of re-bars and form work in strict compliance with the MEP Material installation methods.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree Electrical Engineering or related field 
• Advanced knowledge of design software in relation to the MEP design including AutoCAD or Revit and MS office software such as Excel, Word, Power Point, MS Project & Access
• 5+ Years of Experience in a designer and drafting role 
• Must have knowledge/experience with ACMV systems
• Good understanding of MEP Building construction 
• Experience with air-conditioning design 
• Must be able to work under pressure. 
• Have good negotiation skills, Communication skills, interpersonal skills; and problem solving skills, a minimum basic understanding of English
Company Profile:

Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
- Assisting in the preparation of budgets
- Working with internal and tax auditor.
- Managing records and receipts
- Preparing balance sheets Processing invoices
- Reconciling daily, monthly and yearly transactions
- Developing an in-depth knowledge of the organization and process
- Ensuring compliance with financial policies regulation, and procedures
- Performing finance analysis, reporting and management tasks
- Being a key point of contact for other departments on financial and accounting matters
- Supporting the Finance Manager and executives with projects and tasks when required
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or Business
- Having experiences working with internal and tax auditor.
- Ability to work under minimal supervision and deliver on set objectives within given deadlines
- Solid knowledge of financial and accounting procedures
- Proven work experience as a Finance Officer or similar role
- Strong ethics, with an ability to manage confidential data
- Excellent analytical and numerical skills
- Having Good Commands of English

** Benefit:
- 13th Salary.
- Salary reviews twice per year.
- 5.5 days working per week, 1.5 days off per week;
- Public holiday;
- Uniform Provide;
- Insurance (NSSF);
- Yearly staff party and retreat;

- E-mail: hr@schneitec.com.kh 
- Contact number: (+855) 61 352 640, (+855) 23 215 471
Address: #36, Street 352, Boeung Keng Kang I, Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

job title: អ្នកឆុងកាហ្វេ
position: អ្នកឆុងកាហ្វេ
Job Description: 1. ទទួលរាក់ទាក់ភ្ញៀវឬបុគ្គលិកក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន នឹងអ្នករួមក្រុម2. រៀបចំឆុងកាហ្វេ តែ និងភេសជ្ជះ ផ្សេងៗជូនភ្ញៀវ ឬ បុគ្គលិក3. រក្សាអនាម័យ បរិវេណធ្វើការ តុឬម៉ាស៊ីនឆុងកាហ្វេ4. គ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកសំភារៈ សំរាប់ភេសជ្ជះឬឥវ៉ាន់ផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ពន្ធ័5. រៀបចំទុកដាក់សំភារៈ វេចខ្ចប់ ត្រឹមត្រូវ និងមានសោភ័ណភាព6. ការថែរក្សា និងប្រើប្រាស់ សំភារៈបានយូរអង្វែង7. រៀបចំទុកដាក់ សំភារៈ មានរបៀប តាមប្រភេទ តាមខ្នាត ត្រឹមត្រូវ8.  ចេះកែឆ្នៃ និង ប្រើប្រាស់ឲ្យអស់លទ្ធភាព នូ​វសំភារៈ​​នីមួយៗ ទៅតាមក្បួនខ្នាត
Job Requirement: - មានអាយុយ៉ាងតិចចាប់ពី ១៨ឆ្នាំឡើង- មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើតួនាទី- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់​ អត់ធ្មត់ ស្មោះត្រង់ និងឧស្សាព្យាយាម- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារផ្នែកជំនាញឆុងកាហ្វេនឹងតែ យ៉ាងតិចចាប់ពី ១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ'- ត្រូវគោរពពេលវេលានិងមកធ្វើការឲ្យបានទៀងទាត់តាមគោលការណ៏  របស់់ក្រុមហ៊ុន- មានសុខភាពល្អ និងកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន- ពេលទំនេរអាចជួយការងារផ្សេងៗដែលអាចធ្វើទៅបាន
Company Profile: Orkidé Villa Group is a real estate development company based in Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. The company specializes in the development of high-quality, mixed-use developments,based on principally residential uses. Bringing together a Board of Directors with a wide variety of skills and experience, Orkidé Villa Group develops market leading and prestigious schemes. Building on the success of our first project, Orkidé Villa ‘The Grand’, we have commenced construction of ‘The Royal’ and ‘The Botanic City’ schemes that we aim to deliver a new benchmark of quality for the Cambodia market.We are committed to offering the highest level of service to our customers and to producing developments that are widely recognized for their caliber.

- ពង្រីកការលក់ និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ,ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍អំពីស្តុកផលិតផល និងចំណូលចំណាយនៃការលក់អោយប្រធានផ្នែកលក់របស់ខ្លួន

- អត្តចរិត និងឥរិយាបថសមរម្យ,ថ្លៃថ្នូរ និងស្រលាញ់ការងារ និង មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិតខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
- ភាពស្មោះត្រង់,ហ្មត់ចត់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារមានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ចំពោះការងារ

Closing Date: 28 February 2021
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resources Department  (855-12) 800 800 | 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 careers@cellcard.com.kh No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh (855-12) 800 800 | 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s in B-Ed, TESOL or related field
- At least 2 years of working experience in administration, preferably in educational institution
- Excellent written and spoken communication in English and Khmer
- Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint applications
- be flexible and patient and can work under pressure
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Sek Somonn  078 777 117 info@ngis.edu.kh #2,4, St. 156 corner 211, SangKat Veal Vong, Khan 7Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 777 117
